post: Still possible to get last minutes tickets to a nativity scene today?

comment.body: There are many where you just stay on a queue. Try with Fundacion Cajasol, in Chicarreroa Street, pretty centric and they have a website
Do you know when is the show today? I don’t see it in the website
It's not a show, it's a display... you can get more info on their website... it runs all day non-stop, and it's quite popular. I remember visiting it as a child. Some towns in the outskirts
It's just a scene. Like a set up of miniatures. Nothing moves, there's no music, it's not theatre. So you can go any time and look at it. Just that there will be queues.
That'd be something, a show. Can you imagine the had shows on about Christmas?

There are some towns that have recreations on a schedule (imagine how painful can it be to redo from start every time a car parks in town... come on, boys, take the angel back to the top of the church! Star ready! On your marks! Where the hell is baby Jesús?)
